Verses: 1 en Buththiyeenaththai Neengal Satre Sagiththaal Nalamaayirukkum; Ennai Sagiththumirukkireergale.
2 naan Ungalaik Karpulla Kanniyaagak Kiristhu Ennum Ore Purushanukku Oppukkodukka Niyamiththapadiyaal, Ungalukkaaga Dhevavairaakkiyamaana Vairaakkiyangondirukkiren.
3 aagilum, Sarppamaanadhu Thannudaiya Thandhiraththinaale Evaalai Vanjiththadhupola, Ungal Manadhum Kiristhuvaippatriya Unmaiyinindru Vilagumpadi Kedukkappadumovendru Payandhirukkiren.

4 eppadiyenil, Ungalidaththil Varugiravan Naangal Pirasangiyaadha Veroru Yesuvaip Pirasangiththaanaanaal, Alladhu Neengal Petriraadha Veroru Aaviyaiyum, Neengal Etrukkollaadha Veroru Suviseshaththaiyum Petreergalaanaal, Nandraai Sagiththiruppeergale.
5 magaa Piradhaana Apposthalarilum, Naan Ondrilum Kuraivullavanallavendru Ennugiren.
6 naan Pechchile Kallaadhavanaayirundhaalum, Arivile Kallaadhavanalla; Endha Vishayaththilum Ellaarukku Munbaagavum Ungalukkulle Naangal Velippattirukkirome.
7 neengal Uyarththappadumpadi Naan Ennaiththaane Thaazhththi, Dhevanudaiya Suviseshaththai Ilavasamaai Ungalukkup Pirasangiththadhinaale Kutrancheydheno?
8 ungalukku Oozhiyanjeyyumpadikku, Matra Sabaigalidaththil Sambalaththaippetru, Avargalaik Kollaiyitten.

9 naan Ungalodirundhu Kuraivupattapodhum, Oruvaraiyum Naan Varuththappaduththavillai; Makkedhoniyaavilirundhu Vandha Sagodharar En Kuraivai Niraivaakkinaargal, Evvidhaththileyum Ungalukkup Baaramaayiraadhapadikku Jaakkiradhaiyaayirundhen, Inimelum Jaakkiradhaiyaayiruppen.
10 agaayaanaattin Thisaigalile Indhap Pugazhchchi Ennaivittu Neenguvadhillaiyendru Ennilulla Kiristhuvinudaiya Saththiyaththaikkondu Sollugiren.
11 ippadi Sollavendiyadhenna? Naan Ungalai Sinegiyaadhapadiyinaaleyo? Dhevan Arivaar.

12 melum, Engalai Virodhikka Samayandhedugiravargalukku Samayam Kidaiyaadhapadikku, Thangalaikkuriththu Menmaipaaraattugira Kaariyaththil Avargal Engalaippolak Kaanappadumpadi, Naan Seyvadhaiye Innum Seyven.
13 appadippattavargal Kalla Apposthalargal, Kapadamulla Velaiyaatkal, Kirisdhuvinudaiya Apposthalarin Veshaththaith Thariththukkondavargalaayirukkiraargal.
14 adhu Aachchariyamalla, Saaththaanum Oliyin Thoodhanudaiya Veshaththaith Thariththukkolvaane.
15 aagaiyaal Avanudaiya Oozhiyakkaararum Needhiyin Oozhiyakkaararudaiya Veshaththaith Thariththukkondaal Adhu Aachchariyamallave; Avargal Mudivu Avargal Kiriyaigalukkuththakkadhaayirukkum.
16 pinnum Naan Sollugiren; Oruvanum Ennaip Puththiyeenanendru Ennavendaam; Appadi Enninaal, Naanum Satre Menmaipaaraattumpadi, Ennaip Buththiyeenanaippolaagilum Etrukkollungal.
17 ippadi Naan Sollugiradhu Karththarukketrapadi Sollaamal, Menmaipaaraattum Dhairiyaththinaale Puththiyeenanaippolach Sollugiren.
18 anegar Maamsaththirketrapadi Menmaipaaraattikkollugaiyil, Naanum Menmaipaaraattuven.
19 neengal Buththiyullavargalaayirundhu Buththiyillaadhavargalai Sandhoshamaai Sagiththirukkireergale.

20 oruvan Ungalai Siraiyaakkinaalum, Oruvan Ungalaip Patchiththaalum, Oruvan Ungalaik Kaivasappaduththinaalum, Oruvan Thannai Uyarththinaalum, Oruvan Ungalai Mugaththil Araindhaalum Sagiththirukkireergale.

21 naangal Balaveenaraanadhupola, Engalukku Vandha Kanaveenaththaikkuriththup Pesugiren; Oruvan Edhile Thunivullavanaayirukkiraano Adhile Naanum Thunivullavanaayirukkiren; Ippadip Buththiyeenamaaip Pesugiren.
22  Avargal Ebireyaraa? Naanum Ebireyan; Avargal Isravelaraa? Naanum Isravelan; Avargal Aabiragaamin Sandhadhiyaaraa? Naanum Aabiragaamin Sandhadhiyaan.

23 avargal Kiristhuvin Oozhiyakkaararaa? Naan Adhigam; Buththiyeenamaaip Pesugiren; Naan Adhigamaaip Pirayaasappattavan, Adhigamaai Adipattavan, Adhigamaaik Kaavalgalil Vaikkappattavan, Anegandharam Marana Avadhiyil Agappattavan.
24 yoodhargalaal Ondrukuraiya Naarpadhatiyaaga Aindhudharam Adipatten;
25 moondrudharam Milaarugalaal Adipatten, Orudharam Kalleriyunden, Moondrudharam Kapparsedhaththil Irundhen, Kadalile Oru Raappagal Muzhuvadhum Pokkinen.

26 anegandharam Pirayaanampanninen; Aarugalaal Vandha Mosangalilum, Kallaraal Vandha Mosangalilum, En Suyajanangalaal Vandha Mosangalilum, Anniya Janangalaal Vandha Mosangalilum, Pattanangalil Undaana Mosangalilum, Vanaandharaththil Undaana Mosangalilum, Samuththiraththil Undaana Mosangalilum, Kallasagodhararidaththil Undaana Mosangalilum;
27 pirayaasaththilum, Varuththaththilum, Anegamurai Kanvizhippugalilum, Pasiyilum Thaakaththilum, Anegamurai Ubavaasangalilum, Kulirilum, Nirvaanaththilum Irundhen.
28 ivai Mudhalaanavaigalaiyallaamal, Ellaa Sabaigalaikkuriththum Undaayirukkira Kavalai Ennai Naaldhorum Nerukkugiradhu.
29 oruvan Balaveenanaanaal Naanum Balaveenanaagiradhillaiyo? Oruvan Idarinaal En Manam Eriyaadhirukkumo?
30 naan Menmaipaaraattavendumaanaal, En Balaveenaththirkaduththavaigalaik Kuriththu Menmaipaaraattuven.
31 endrendraikkum Sthoththirikkappatta Dhevanum, Nammudaiya Karththaraagiya Yesukiristhuvin Pidhaavumaanavar Naan Poi Sollugiradhillaiyendru Arivaar.
32 thamaskupattanaththu Areththaa Raajaavinudaiya Senaiththalaivan Ennaip Pidikkavendumendru Thamaskarudaiya Pattanaththaik Kaavalvaiththuk Kaaththaan;
33 appozhudhu Naan Koodaiyile Vaikkappattu, Jannalilirundhu Madhilvazhiyaai Irakkividappattu, Avanudaiya Kaikkuth Thappinen.
